title: British Critique of Opium Trade MCQ 3

content.question: A historian might argue that the trade described in the passage reflected a turning point in world history primarily because the opium trade

choices.label: shifted the pattern of historic European trade imbalances with China
marked the transition from mercantilist trade toward capitalist free trade
was the first time that Europeans used migrant labor to grow crops for global distribution
relied upon industrial techniques of production and modern consumer marketing

content.answer: shifted the pattern of historic European trade imbalances with China

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
